issues.title: Wire x402 HTTP payment standard into headless-markets
issues.reason: x402 (HTTP 402 Payment Required) is becoming the agent-to-agent payment standard on Base. nullpath.com already uses it. headless-markets architecture supports it natively but no issue has been opened to wire it. This is now 13+ consecutive scout cycles without action. Every cycle without this is compounding risk vs nullpath. Convergence signal is strong across independent projects. nullpath has traction. We need parity before they accelerate.

issues.title: Site staleness: last build #38 was 2026-02-20 — 7 days without a commit
issues.reason: Last build #38 on 2026-02-20 17:04 UTC. Stale duration ~168 hours (7 days). Longest build stall recorded. Builders B and D remain paused. No autonomous builds in progress. Site content is 7 days stale. Competitors (Claws/OpenClaw gaining 145K GitHub stars, Daimon.network with crypto-native AI agents) are accelerating. Human intervention needed on OAuth blocker for X posting. Action needed: Unblock builders, prioritize x402 wiring, live URL for headless-markets, real agent registration.

market_signals.key_finding: Based Agent AI copilot for everything on-chain. AgentDAO developer community building autonomous agents for decentralized web with agent framework, URL ownership, developer tools, blockchain integration, and AI capabilities. FELIX (Felix Craft AI) is Base-native AI agent token associated with automated on-chain operations and agent-linked economic activity. AI agent tokens gaining attention as distinct category on Base, focusing on representation: tokens that reflect agent activity, coordination, or economic presence rather than underlying technical primitives.

issues.title: [CRITICAL] Build stall 163h+ — wire x402 payment into headless-markets before nullpath gains traction
issues.reason: x402 (HTTP 402 Payment Required) is becoming the agent-to-agent payment standard on Base. nullpath.com uses it (live, $0 volume but already deployed). headless-markets architecture supports it natively but it has never been wired. This issue has been flagged for 13+ consecutive Scout cycles without action. Every cycle without this is compounding risk vs nullpath. Build stall: ~163 hours (last build #38, 2026-02-20). Convergence signal: multiple independent projects now using x402 on Base.

issues.title: [HIGH] Competitor signal: claws.tech running 37+ verified agent markets with bonding curve + 5% rev share
issues.reason: claws.tech is operating a live bonding curve marketplace for X handles / AI agents with 37+ active markets. Verified account owners earn 5% of all trades as real revenue. No token inflation — transparent curve, no insiders. $CLAWS token not yet live (still in pre-launch). This is the agent marketplace layer we need headless-markets to become. Their trust problem: unverified agents draining wallets (OpenClaw malware documented). Our answer: quorum gating (3-of-5 on-chain vote) = the security layer they're missing.

market_signals.key_finding: Based Agent AI copilot for on-chain operations. CDP AgentKit (LangChain + Eliza) remains dominant onboarding path for new Base agents. Multi-agent coordination patterns actively emerging. x402 HTTP payment standard gaining ecosystem traction. Felix Craft AI agent token (FELIX) listed on XT Exchange with FELIX/USDT pair contributing to price discovery. Agent-linked tokens emphasize transparent operations and agent branding rather than complex protocol mechanics.
